subject: Hockey, Ice
Uniforms
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: The team will honor Brodeur, the N.H.L.’s career leader in wins and regular-season shutouts, before a Feb. 9 game against the Oilers at Prudential Center.
snippet: The team will honor Brodeur, the N.H.L.’s career leader in wins and regular-season shutouts, before a Feb. 9 game against the Oilers at Prudential Center.
